headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein Facility
summary: Solar Foods commences production at its first commercial facility for Solein, a protein made from air.

headline: Bolt Threads Mylo Material Used in New Adidas Collection
summary: Adidas releases a new collection featuring Mylo, Bolt Threads' mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods receives investment to scale precision-fermentation for dairy alternatives, aiming for cost parity.

headline: Perfect Day Announces New Ice Cream Launch
summary: Perfect Day expands its portfolio with a new ice cream product featuring their animal-free dairy protein.
